title: ScaleAl lays off an entire team; then invites employees to..
description: Scale AI has disbanded its Dallas-based New Projects Organization, a team of contractors focused on general AI chatbot improvement. This move, following a significant Meta investment, signals an industry pivot towards specialized, expert-level AI training in fields like medicine and robotics.  Affected workers received severance and were offered opportunities on Scale's gig platform.

Vegas aims to bolster their goaltending with Hart, who will be eligible to play from December 1st, potentially debuting soon after.

title: Blake Lively worried for Ryan Reynolds as Taylor Swift keeps her distance
description: Blake Lively is reportedly terrified about her husband Ryan Reynolds' future in Hollywood after Taylor Swift has allegedly cut ties with her. A source claims Swift has "totally shut her out," leaving Lively concerned about the repercussions of losing the pop star's influential friendship.
